  • "Joseph the Dreamer"

Download PDF View on Timeline
Title:
"Joseph the Dreamer"
Author:
Israel Zangwill
Date Created:
1898
Description:
Fictional tale of a Jewish conversion in Rome on a night when Chanukah and Christmas overlap.
Subjects:
Jews--Fiction Jewish fiction
Language:
English
Location:
New York
Publisher:
Harper & Brothers Publishers
Source Identifier:
vjwp_188
Type:
book
Format:
pdf
Relation:
In Dreamers of the Ghetto, pp. 21-67.
Source
Preferred Citation:
""Joseph the Dreamer"," Victorian Jewish Writers Project. victorianjewishwritersproject.org/items/vjwp_188.html
Reference Link:
victorianjewishwritersproject.org/items/vjwp_188.html

Victorian Jewish Writers Project

Welcome to the Victorian Jewish Writers Project, a digital collection focusing on Anglo-Jewish writing during the long nineteenth century. The site is a work-in-progress, so please contact katzir [at] vjwp [dot] org if you need one-on-one assistance.
